name: Babel-o-Rama
description:
A simple game about language and friendship. Settle through your differences and work together to decode challenges. Unity in diversity!

*Minimum of 2 players and a WiFI router / LAN connection is required.
Please watch the tutorial video provided before starting the game.

A prototype for Goethe Game Jam 19 - 21 May 2017.

Development team:

Jeffin Andria P.
M. Tomy Kurniawan
Fandry Indrayadi
Siska Butar Butar
Cherina La Rubatt
M. Abdul Karim

Play with your beloved friends. And don't forget to have fun!!!
